predicate.note: Frames file for 'obviate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: He said that even though virtually all corn seeds currently planted [*] are hybrids , the genetic approach will obviate the need for mechanical emasculation of anthers , which [*T*-38] costs U.S. seed producers about $ 70 million [*U*] annually .
example.arg: even though virtually all corn seeds currently planted [*] are hybrids
